Card

Source: src/components/card/card

Card Components are thumbnails of content and may include the following optional elements:

  1. Program label or badge
  2. Plain language headline
  3. Program name
  4. Plain language description
  5. Link to learn more about the program guide
  6. “Apply Now” call-to-action button

New Commercial Driver

Red Hook on the Road

Through this program students prepare to work as commercial drivers.

Learn more: Home Energy Assistance Program

How to Apply 

<article class="c-card">
  <header class="c-card__header">
    <h3 class="c-card__title">
      <mark class="badge">New</mark>
      <a href="demos/programs/red-hook-on-the-road">Commercial Driver</a>
    </h3>
  </header>
  <div class="c-card__body">
    <h4 class="c-card__subtitle">Red Hook on the Road</h4>
    <div class="c-card__summary">
      <p>Through this program students prepare to work as commercial drivers.</p>
      <p>
        <a href="demos/programs/red-hook-on-the-road">Learn more<span class="sr-only">: Home Energy Assistance Program</span>
        </a>
      </p>
      <p class="text-end">
        <a class="btn btn-secondary btn-next w-full tablet:w-auto" href="demos/programs/red-hook-on-the-road#next-steps">
          <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-wnyc-ui">
            <use xlink:href="#icon-wnyc-ui-arrow-left"></use>
          </svg>
          <span>How to Apply</span>
          <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-wnyc-ui">
            <use xlink:href="#icon-wnyc-ui-arrow-right"></use>
          </svg>
        </a>
      </p>
    </div>
  </div>
</article>

Simple Card

Source: src/components/card/card-simple

Elements can be added, removed, or modified with utilities as needed for different views.

Commercial Driver

Red Hook on the Road

Learn more: Home Energy Assistance Program
